subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN3415 is on the way

conversations.body_text: Hi Nick van Drongelen,    We apologize for the inconvenience, but this item is currently out of stock and will ship next Monday.

What is out of stock? What has been shipped?

On Fri, 14 Nov 2025, 3:22 pm service@simsonn.com,
Can you please provide a date this will be shipped?
Hi Nick van Drongelen,    The handbrake is currently out of stock. We will ship it to you next Monday.

Monday the 17th or 24th?

On Fri, 14 Nov 2025, 7:01 pm service@simsonn.com,
17th

Have my items been shipped?

On Fri, 14 Nov 2025, 7:47 pm service@simsonn.com,
Hi Nick van Drongelen,    Your parcel has been dispatched and is expected to arrive around the 27th. We apologise for any delay and inconvenience caused.

Can you please provide a tracking number?

On Tue, 18 Nov 2025, 8:41 pm service@simsonn.com,
Can you please provide a valid tracking number?
Can you please update the tracking number

I'm getting really frustrated that you have not responded to me with a
valid tracking number
You have said my items have been shipped, so provide a vaild tracking
number ASAP

Hi Nick van Drongelen,    We apologize for the delayed response. We've been extremely busy lately and genuinely missed your email. Your order has already been shipped, and we'll update you with the international tracking number tomorrow.

Another 2 days has past with no tracking number. Can you please advise the
tracking number. This is the worst service I have ever received

On Sat, 22 Nov 2025, 12:13 am service@simsonn.com,

Where is my tracking number?
Four fucking days of waiting with no response, sort this out NOW

WHERE IS MY FUCKING TRACKING NUMBER?

WHAT THE FUCK IS HAPPENING.
WHY ARE YOU SO USELESS. REPLY OR FUCKING REFUND MY ORDER.

THIS IS FUCKING RIDICULOUS
Can I please have a tracking number.

Hi, the 27th has been and gone, package still not delivered, you have
failed to provide a vaild tracking number, and from talking to your alibaba
representative, they have told me the handbrake is still currently out of
stock. Due to all this, I request a full refund, as I believe you have not
shipped any of my items. And failed to even respone to any of my current
emails. You have lied to me from the beginning with sending me a false
tracking number. It wasn't until I asked about the handbrake you informed
me of being out of stock.
This is the worst customer service I have ever received.
I am very well known in the NZ sim racing community and I will be raising
this issue with my peers, and making people aware to proceed with extreme
caution, also giving them the transcripts of this email chain.
I would appreciate a quick response to this matter to stop it from
escalating further.

On Tue, 18 Nov 2025, 8:41 pm service@simsonn.com,

Hi Nick van Drongelen,     We sincerely apologize for the delay in processing your order. Due to a temporary disruption at our warehouse, we regret any inconvenience this may have caused. Rest assured, I have instructed the warehouse team to expedite the shipment of your order.

What is the status of the order? Where is it?
What is the tracking number?

On Tue, 2 Dec 2025, 9:10 pm service@simsonn.com,
Hi Nick van Drongelen,    I apologize for not getting back to you sooner. Here is your shipping tracking link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=9484728245

Hi my order has arrived, but it is wrong,
I ordered the extended handle model you have sent the standed handle

Can you please send the extended handle that is what i paid for.





On Sat, 6 Dec 2025, 12:50 am service@simsonn.com,
Hi Nick van Drongelen,    We apologize and will resend it to you immediately.
